docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is stable and recommended for use. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or using api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/config_templates/1007981701-centos5_3_pxelinux
200
{
  "id": 1007981701,
  "name": "centos5_3_pxelinux",
  "template_kind_id": 452984334,
  "template_kind_name": "PXELinux",

methods.name: create

params.name: operatingsystem_ids
params.description: Array of operating system IDs to associate with the template

params.name: locked
params.description: Whether or not the template is locked for editing

examples:
POST /api/config_templates
{
  "config_template": {
    "template": "This is a test template",
    "template_kind_id": "698706415",
    "name": "RandomName"
  }
}
200
{
  "id": 1007981703,
  "name": "RandomName",
  "template_kind_id": 698706415,
  "template_kind_name": "iPXE",
  "snippet": null,
  "audit_comment": null,
  "created_at": "2014-08-07T20:40:53Z",
  "updated_at": "2014-08-07T20:40:53Z",
  "template": "This is a test template",
  "locked": false,
  "locations": [],
  "organizations": [],
  "template_combinations": [],
  "operatingsystems": [],
  "os_default_templates": []
}

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: operatingsystem_ids
params.description: Array of operating system IDs to associate with the template

params.name: locked
params.description: Whether or not the template is locked for editing

methods.name: destroy

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: build_pxe_default

apis.short_description: Update the default PXE menu on all configured TFTP servers

examples:
GET /api/config_templates/build_pxe_default
200
PXE Default file has been deployed to all Smart Proxies
